## hpr2106 :: My Podcast Client

 
This is a show about my podcast client. Apologies for any rough edges as I did it in a hurry to answer the call for more shows

Hpodder homepage
https://github.com/jgoerzen/hpodder/wiki
Manual in HTML format
https://jgoerzen.github.com/hpodder/html/hpodder.man.html
Manual in PDF format
https://jgoerzen.github.com/hpodder/hpodder.pdf
Hpodder Man page
https://manpages.ubuntu.com/manpages/precise/man1/hpodder.1.html
